price: 7 qui refusent de s’acquitter de l’aumône et de croire en l’au-delà.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
